title: Police investigate Columbus Fairgrounds shooting
content:
COLUMBUS, Miss. (WTVA) - Police are investigating after an apparent shooting early Monday morning in Columbus.
A Christmas Day party came to an abrupt end at the Columbus Fairgrounds about 1 a.m. 911 dispatch says police and first responders were called in to a shooting at the Fairgrounds on Highway 69.
One man was hit and airlifted to a hospital. This is all the information we know at this point. We don’t know the victim’s name or his condition or if there is a suspect in custody.
Many people have posted on social media after the shooting saying they are alarmed by the number of shootings at the Fairgrounds in recent years and say they don't feel safe going there anymore.
WTVA has reached out all day to several officials with the city and police department to get more details. We have not heard back but we’ll keep you updated as we get more information.
